trend_summary: Built-up areas remain small and clustered around the central township, spreading slightly south and north along the main highway. Farmland parcels consolidate, while some forest on the western slopes alternates between regrowth and a recent large brown scar, hinting at logging or fire. Transport corridors appear upgraded, and a new pond emerges northeast.
notable_changes: Incremental expansion of the central town, filling in strips along the primary northâ€“south road.
Agricultural blocks enlarge and merge, reducing patchiness in eastern and southern lowlands.
Western mountains show a fresh brown swath in the last image, indicating logging or wildfire damage.
Main highway straightened/dual-laned in segments, with clearer junctions near the town core.
Small reservoir or pond constructed northeast of the urban core, replacing former fields.
